Hamarhraft Location & Where to Find

Location: The Risen Road. Waukeen's Rest, inside a Gilded Chest in the upstairs smoldering room, adjacent to the room with Benryn.

Hamarhraft Notes & Tips

The Gilded Chest the Hamarhraft is located in is locked and must be lockpicked with a skill check of 20 or higher. If the Hamarhraft is not acquired before the next long rest, the Gilded Chest will be broken and the items inside will be left on the ground where the chest was. Rarity: Uncommon V
